alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Huerfano and southwestern Las Animas Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Hoehne, or 13 miles north of Trinidad, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Aguilar, Cokedale, Branson, Starkville, Gulnare, Hoehne, Tyrone, Trinchera, Boncarbo, Model, Segundo, Thatcher, Raton Pass and Weston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
